Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed in the area of Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing in the area of Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing in the area of Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time
